item.title: Mathematics Recordings
item.description: The post is simply for collecting recordings from famed mathematicians. The list will be kept updated. Prof. Jean Dieudonn√©: “The Historical Development of Algebraic Geometry” Serre: Finite groups, Yesterday and Today “How to write mathematics badly” by Jean-Pierre Serre John Conway: Surreal Numbers - How playing games led to more numbers than anybody ever thought of Differential Topology | Lectures by John W.
